name: 陳豐年
objective:
本課主要講授公司法的規定。相關的法律理論都會被介紹。學生將被指定閱讀教科書和法院判決。課堂參與是必要的。
This course teaches Company Act. Company Act covers procedural rules of incorporation, duties of a president, board members, or shareholders. Students will be assigned to read a textbook and several court decisions. Class participation is required.
schedule:
Week 1	Introduction to The Course & The Outline of Commercial Laws in  Taiwan
Week2	Basics of Taiwan Corporate Law
Week3	The Origins of Corporate: from legal and economic views
Week4	The Categories and Structure of Corporates
Week5	Board of Directors I
Week6	Board of Directors II
Week7	Board of Directors III
Week8	Proposal Discussion
Week9	Mid-term Exam (multiple choice)
Week10	Board of Directors IV
Week11	Shareholders’ Meeting I
Week12	Shareholders’ Meeting II
Week13	Shareholders’ Meeting III
Week14	Shareholders’ Meeting IV
Week15	Presentation (Group 1)
Week16	Presentation (Group 2)
Week17	Presentation (Group 3)
Week18	Presentation (Group 4)
scorePolicy:
1.	Mid-term Exam: Multiple Choice 50%
2.	Term Presentation: 40%
        Students are encouraged to focus the presentation on legal aspects of corporate activities. The leaders of every group will score higher.          
3.	Class Participation: 10%
materials: CHING-PING, SHIOU, COPORATE ACT: LAWS AND CASES, 2nd Ed., Sep. 2022 (邵慶平，公司法：規範與案例，元照出版公司，二版，2023 年 8 月)
consultation: You can schedule 50-minute virtual or in-person meetings to discuss your study strategies and problems via email.
